relevant_findings.general: Patient is hard of hearing but in no acute distress.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft with mild epigastric pain to palpation; no rebound or guarding or masses.
relevant_findings.extremities: No cyanosis, clubbing, or edema. Right knee and hip prosthesis.
relevant_findings.gait: Patient is not steady on his feet without his cane.
